About

Steven Olson worked for 10 years as a commercial fisherman in Alaska before enrolling at the Turing School of Software and Design, where he is currently studying full stack web development. He has a BA in English from Colorado Mesa University, and a passion for travel and photography.

Email: steveoscaro@gmail.com
